description: One-minute skill: Setup and Punchline: Comedy's Oldest Formula.

hook.text: Every joke has two parts: the setup builds an assumption, the punchline shatters it. That's it.

discovery.text: Punchline: 'She looked surprised.' The word 'surprised' means both 'shocked' and 'has high eyebrows.

twist.text: The punchline works because it's BOTH meanings simultaneously.

punchline.text: Two parts. One assumption. One surprise.
